when-person-moved-in.required: Tell us when the tenant moved into the property
when-person-moved-in.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
when-person-moved-in.date: Enter a real date of birth
when-person-moved-in.after: This service only applies to tenants who moved in after 30 November 2014
when-person-moved-in.before: This date must not be in the future

tenant-dob.test: [X] cannot be born after they moved into the rental property. Enter a date after [Y].
tenant-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
tenant-dob.over18: The [X] must be 18 years or older. The right to rent scheme does not apply to children.

tenant-nationality.required: Select a country of nationality from the list

ho-ref-number.required: Enter a Home Office reference number

privacy-check.required: Confirm you have read the Data Protection statement

before-or-after-1988.required: Tell us whether the [X] came to the UK before 1988

extra-tenant-ni-num.niNumber: Enter a National Insurance number in the correct format

date-tenant-moved-uk.required: Enter a date the tenant came to the UK
date-tenant-moved-uk.after120years: Enter a real date the [X] came to the UK
date-tenant-moved-uk.dateAfterDob: Date must be after the [X]'s date of birth. Enter a date after [Y]

extra-tenant-tel.internationalPhoneNumber: Enter a real telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192

tenant-address-line-1.required: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street
